participant_1.background:
I have a diverse ethnic background, but I identify most with my Filipino heritage.
I like to play video games with my friends to take my mind off of things.
my favorite hobby is knitting.
I pretended to be asleep when the cop approached my car.
I prefer to keep my hair natural, as I like to focus on the food I cook.

participant_2.background:
I love my family, but my pets are my best friends.
i am an engineer.
I started my own photography business from home so I could listen to my music while working.
i am taking a year off before i start college.
my mother stayed at home all day to raise me and my siblings.

content.text: Hey there, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to take pictures of animals, I have a photography business that I started from home so I can listen to my music while working.
That's cool, I like to play video games with my friends to take my mind off of things.
Me too, I like playing games with my cats.
lol, I don't have any pets right now, but I love animals. My family is Filipino so I grew up with dogs, cats, and chickens.
My family is from Taiwan, but I was born in the US. I love my family, but my pets are my best friends.
I know the feeling, I love my family but I'm a little more comfortable around animals.
That's normal, animals are always happy to see you.
Yeah, I wish people were like that.
You're right, people can be a lot of work.
I'm glad we can agree on something.
